title: @SUMA_Make_Spec_FS
description: Prepare for surface viewing in SUMA

subject_id.title: Subject ID
subject_id.description: Required subject ID for file naming

debug.title: Debug level
debug.description: Print debug information along the way; default level is 0, max is 2

filesystem_path.title: Filesystem path
filesystem_path.description: Path to 'surf' and 'orig' directories; defaults to './', the current directory

extra_annot_labels.title: Extra annotation labels
extra_annot_labels.description: Convert extra annot files into ROI datasets

extra_fs_dsets.title: Extra FreeSurfer datasets
extra_fs_dsets.description: List other datasets to include; defaults are thickness, curv, sulc

use_mgz.title: Use MGZ flag
use_mgz.description: Use MGZ volumes even if COR volumes are there

gnifti.title: GNIFTI flag
gnifti.description: Produce files in exchangeable formats; same as -NIFTI

nifti.title: NIFTI flag
nifti.description: Produce files in exchangeable formats; output files in NIFTI format and surfaces in GIFTI format

inflate.title: Inflation factor
inflate.description: Create moderately inflated surfaces using SurfSmooth; control the amount of smoothness with INF

set_space.title: Set space
set_space.description: Set the space flag of all volumes; defaults to 'orig' space

ld.title: Linear depth
ld.description: Create standard mesh surfaces with mesh density linear depth set to LD

ldpref.title: Linear depth prefix
ldpref.description: Supply the prefix option for MapIcosahedron; defaults to std.LD
